TopicTitle: Convert Random Letters to a Sentence!

Articles.Content:
Life, verily, is nothing. Even for good horses.

pouiwermm

*Pink ore underground is what*

*Every rocket motor makes.*

For some reason that sounds like it should be a kerbal nursery rhyme or something. Except it doesn't rhyme...

alwierygu

Algorithms like water in every run. Your gun's used.

XDIKEXE

Xeroxing Documents in Kinkos Eliminates Xenon Exposure

aijwots

Anyway, I just wish olives tasted sweet.

fluwpnn

Fly *Linda* under water posing no negativeness.

ITNENFDE

I think *New Electronics* needs fully documented episodes

NNMNTNM

Not noticing Martin, Nathan thinks "News Media!"

HSOWHN

His "significant other" was his niece

(Nasty inbreeding hillbillies!)

siffshu

Oh my. ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

Sitting in front, Frank shouted horrible utterances.

UHOHOHMY

Unanimously, Hiroshima's oldest Hentai observers hated most Yakuza.

pophsdbe

Popular Oak Pods Have Small Drinks Because Education.

SMPKSP

Smiling Marvin played Kerbal Space Program.

WTFBBQ

Will trade for beanie baby Quakers

(Wanted to avoid the obvious ones, but yeah)

aaaaaa

areoplane accdentally attached airmen airmail

goodle

Gobs Of Odd Delicacies, Ladled Evenly.

trugsinp

Trust Roy under good subjects? Instead, no pizza.

sdfgjk

Sad day for glorious junior Kamikaze.

lejkcef

Let everyone just keep casting enormous farts.

ardkl

> 
> Let's Eat "Jebediah Kerman" cake every friday! ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

A shame but *let's* are two words.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-27T18:52:55Z" title="05/27/2015 06:52  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 27, 2015</time> by theend3r**
Let's Eat "Jebediah Kerman" cake every friday! ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Are really derpy kerbals lame?

MECHJEB

Move Eeloo's Course Height Just Easy Before

NOSFROMPKL

Never Ought Seeing Filthy Rooms On Mars's Pesky Kerbal Life

URMUMLOL

Uranium radiation melted Uber-Man's 'lectric oscillation le

asgdjdc

Alien Superstar goes downtown, jammin'tah dixie chicks

bump
